meaningMnemonic: Cut this <radical>comb</radical> up with your <radical>weapon</radical> and turn it into the <kanji>steps</kanji> for some <kanji>stairs</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You slowly work to create these <kanji>stairs</kanji>, you have to slice up a lot of combs, and at <reading>dawn</reading> (だん) they are done!
